ping.description: Test connectivity with the Figma plugin. Returns {pong: true}.

create.description: Create a new node in Figma (frame, rectangle, text, ellipse, etc.).

parent.description: Parent node ID. Defaults to current page.

batchCreate.description: Create multiple nodes in a single command. Payload is a direct array of CreatePayload objects.

modify.description: Modify properties of an existing node.

batchModify.description: Modify multiple nodes in a single command.

move.description: Move a node to a new position.

nodeIds.description: Array of node IDs to delete

reparent.description: Move a node to a different parent.

query.description: Query nodes in Figma. queryType: "node" (single by target), "selection" (current selection), "page" (page children), "children" (node children — SLOW on large nodes, prefer "describe"), "describe" (fast structural overview).

getFrames.description: Get all top-level frames on the current page.

getViewport.description: Get the current viewport position and zoom.

setViewport.description: Set the viewport position and zoom.

createVariable.description: Create a variable in a collection. Use type "COLOR", "FLOAT", "STRING", or "BOOLEAN".

editVariable.description: Edit an existing variable. Use "values" (plural), not "value".

batchEditVariable.description: Edit multiple variables. Payload is a direct array of edit objects.

getVariables.description: Get all variables, optionally filtered by collection.

includeValues.description: Include hex values for COLOR variables

bindFillVariable.description: Bind a fill variable to a node. nodeId goes in payload, NOT as target.

bindStrokeVariable.description: Bind a stroke variable to a node. nodeId goes in payload.

bindMatchingColors.description: Automatically bind variables to nodes that match by color value. Resolves alias chains.

autoBindByRole.description: Bind variables by semantic role detection (Surface/Page, Text/Primary, Border/Default, etc.).

autoBindSpacing.description: Automatically bind spacing variables to auto-layout nodes.

getVariableById.description: Get a variable by ID with full valuesByMode.

createDesignSystem.description: Create a complete 4-level variable hierarchy (Primitive → Semantic → Tokens → Theme). Supports extracted tokens and conditional boilerplate.

validateDesignSystem.description: Validate the design system structure, modes, naming, and alias chains.

getDesignSystemStatus.description: Get status of the current design system (collection counts, variable counts).

extractDesignTokens.description: Extract design tokens (colors, typography, spacing, shadows) from a frame or the entire file.

scope.description: "node" for a specific frame, "file" for entire file

applyStyle.description: Apply an existing style to a node.

createComponent.description: Create a component from node properties or convert an existing frame.

componentIds.description: Component IDs to group as variants

createInstance.description: Create an instance of a component.

getComponents.description: Get all components in the file.

setAutoLayout.description: Set auto-layout properties on a frame.

exportNode.description: Export a node as PNG, SVG, JPG, or PDF.

createImage.description: Create an image node from base64 data. Use `data` field (NOT imageData).

extractWebsiteCSS.description: Extract CSS from a live website using headless browser. Returns colors, typography, spacing, shadows.

extractWebsiteLayout.description: Extract layout structure from a website using headless browser.

createConnector.description: Create a connector between two nodes (FigJam).

measureText.description: Measure text dimensions for accurate positioning in FigJam workflows.

setEffects.description: Set effects (shadows, blur) on a node.

setCornerRadius.description: Set corner radius on a node.

loadFont.description: Load a font for use in text operations.

getNodeColors.description: Get all colors used in a node (fills and strokes).

getCss.description: Get CSS representation of a node.

findAll.description: Find all nodes matching criteria within a parent.

findText.description: Find text nodes containing specific text.

findAllByType.description: Find all nodes of a specific type.

nodeType.description: Node type to find (FRAME, TEXT, RECTANGLE, etc.)

deleteChildren.description: Delete all children of a node.

boolean.description: Perform a boolean operation on nodes.

createFromSvg.description: Create a node from SVG string.

bindVariable.description: Bind a variable to a node property.

inspectFills.description: Inspect fills and their variable bindings.

unbindVariable.description: Unbind a variable from a node.

bindByExtractedUsage.description: Bind variables based on extracted usage data.

getVariableCollectionById.description: Get a variable collection by ID.

createVariableAliasByIdAsync.description: Create a variable alias by ID (async).

setBoundVariableForPaint.description: Set bound variable for a paint.

setBoundVariableForEffect.description: Set bound variable for an effect.

setBoundVariableForLayoutGrid.description: Set bound variable for a layout grid.

setNodeBoundVariable.description: Set a bound variable on a node.

setVariableCodeSyntax.description: Set code syntax for a variable.

setExplicitVariableMode.description: Set explicit variable mode on a node.

createTextStyleWithVariables.description: Create a text style with variable bindings.

bindTextStyleVariable.description: Bind a variable to a text style.

detachStyle.description: Detach a style from a node.

applyMatchingTextStyles.description: Apply matching text styles to text nodes.

addVariant.description: Add a variant to a component set.

setComponentPropertyReferences.description: Set property references on component children.

swapInstance.description: Swap an instance to a different component.

detachInstance.description: Detach an instance from its component.

analyzeColors.description: Analyze color usage in a frame.

getUsedFonts.description: Get fonts used in the file.

createImageFromUrl.description: Create an image from a URL.

getActiveUsers.description: Get active users in the file.

setRangeFont.description: Set font for a text range.

setRangeFontSize.description: Set font size for a text range.

setRangeColor.description: Set color for a text range.

setRangeLineHeight.description: Set line height for a text range.

setRangeLetterSpacing.description: Set letter spacing for a text range.

getRangeStyles.description: Get styles for a text range.

getRangeFontWeight.description: Get font weight for a text range.

getRangeAllFontNames.description: Get all font names in a text range.

getRangeFills.description: Get fills for a text range.

setRangeFills.description: Set fills for a text range.

getRangeTextStyleId.description: Get text style ID for a range.

setRangeTextStyleIdAsync.description: Set text style ID for a range.

getRangeListOptions.description: Get list options for a text range.

setRangeListOptions.description: Set list options for a text range.

getRangeIndentation.description: Get indentation for a text range.

setRangeIndentation.description: Set indentation for a text range.

getRangeFontName.description: Get font name for a text range.

setRangeFontName.description: Set font name for a text range.

setPluginData.description: Set plugin data on a node.

getPluginData.description: Get plugin data from a node.

importComponentByKey.description: Import a component by key from a library.

importComponentSetByKey.description: Import a component set by key.

getVariablesInLibraryCollection.description: Get variables in a library collection.

findWidgetNodesByWidgetId.description: Find widget nodes by widget ID.

getTopLevelFrame.description: Get the top-level frame for a node.

getMainComponent.description: Get main component of an instance.
